alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland Flagler (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 7:56PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Flagler and southeastern St. Johns Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 756 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Palm Coast, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Bunnell, Marineland, Crescent Beach, Beverly Beach and Espanola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland Flagler
